channel.title: CVE Feed for sparklemotion -- nokogiri
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sparklemotion -- nokogiri

item.title: CVE-2022-24836|2024-09-03T12:03:46.858Z -- sparklemotion -- nokogiri
item.description: Nokogiri is an open source XML and HTML library for Ruby. Nokogiri `< v1.13.4` contains an inefficient regular expression that is susceptible to excessive backtracking when attempting to detect encoding in HTML documents. Users are advised to upgrade to Nokogiri `>= 1.13.4`. There are no known workarounds for this issue.
